website_summaries.verdict: Children love having a  single-purpose accessory high chair, but adults see this model as space-consuming and flimsy.
pros: Fits Baby Alive doll easily and has plenty of tray space for doll food and drink
Light enough for a small child to carry from room to room
cons: Parts are ill-fitting and high chair can fall apart after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Ok.....but.....
customer_reviews.text: Cute and she loved it, but it's cheaply made and comes apart easily. The foot rest hangs so low most dolls slip out of it. My husband drilled holes and slipped ribbon into the frame to hold the foot rest up so doll didn't slip through.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and not very tall..
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and packaged well..Fits Baby Alive doll..Cheaply made and not very tall..I would not buy again, but Grand-daughter likes it, so I'm not returning it..Like most things now a days, it use to be made better than this..You're buying the name, not a quality doll highchair..
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it looks cool and I’m sure my daughter will love it. My only complaint is that the pieces don’t go together quite right (the tabs to hold the toy tight at the base on one side are inside out) but it’s a toy so I wasn’t expecting much. The adjustable height feature gives it that real high chair feel so I’m 98% happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Weird, flimsy design
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is weirdly designed. The base itself is sturdy but the frame for the seat is flimsy. The joints connecting the frame are loose and riveted so you can’t simply tighten them. The chair part sits onto a plastic piece that is connected to the base and one of the plastic pieces won’t click into the base so it sits crooked. Also the tray doesn’t sit level, the whole frame leans forward when the tray is on. Purchased for my two year old daughter to accessorize her baby alive doll. The pattern is cute and matches her stroller that was purchased separately. Im not pleased with this purchase considering the price and the flimsy awkward design.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this high chair. Once we assembled the high chair which was not easy, the buckle for the baby was not something a three year old could manage to thread. It’s not a typical buckle or velcro. The seat cover makes the baby not sit up, it’s an incline and the baby falls out. It appears the seat cover may be too small for the chair making it impossible for the baby to sit in the chair properly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this high chair because my daughter wanted it so bad. First, the instructions are done very poorly. Secondly, the quality is terrible!!!! The chair comes apart literally every time my daughter plays with it. I would have returned it but my daughter didn't want to take her dolly out (she is only 2.5). Definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Moutos

customer_reviews.title: Not the best highchair pretty disappointed:/
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing a negative review but i dont think this is the best highchair:/ the seat pops off everytime we take the baby alive out of it. Im probably going to crazy glue it because its very annoying. The tray table slants so the food slips right off, cheap plastic. The whole thing is pretty cheaply made tbh:( got it for my 4 year old for her birthday, i mean we kept it because it said baby alive, other then that i probably should have returned it. I would definitely recommend getting a wooden one for your baby dolls.
customer_reviews.author: "angeldreams9"

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bad buy. Item keeps falling apart. My daughter does not use it at all. Another item from baby alive that will end up donated.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Highchair
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it. However she said the design should allow for tilting the baby back as that's the only way to get the Baby Alive food to actually go in the baby dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila F

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the brand name
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this early and it was gifted as a Christmas gift. Recently having to throw it away. It was a gift for my two year old and when building it was not as Sturdy as I thought it would be. Bought it for brand name since all her babies are baby Alive. I just had to throw it away cause long story short it was crappy. Just cheap made. Liner rips. Just did not even last 6 months when she barely used it within the time.
customer_reviews.author: VAA

customer_reviews.title: Fairly worthless
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this highchair. Made very poorly not angled well for the doll. I'm guessing it will last a month tops. If anyone has found a sturdy one please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: kkomalley

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a hot mess. The seat just rests in the stand, so if you try to pick it up but the seat like all kids will do every time ... it will come apart. Get something else or get super glue.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday but just threw it out tonight. It falls apart with any contact. So frustrating. Save your money, invest in something wooden. This cheap plastic garbage.
customer_reviews.author: mollyagain

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheaply made 😡🤯
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the worst product I have ever bought. And now it’s hart to return because of this virus and my daughter not wanting to part with it. I got 2 because a friends girl had a birthday I am embarrassed to give it as a gift !
customer_reviews.author: Monica Landers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby high chair for my 5 year old daughter. It’s cute and functional. It fits most babies without a problem. The only thing I have an issue with is. It comes apart if you try to left it up and have to constantly put it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Este C

customer_reviews.title: For older children’s
customer_reviews.text: This product was not very sturdy. Older children need to play with this
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Amazon does it again!
customer_reviews.text: My niece tried to get in this as soon as we put it together (which took maybe 2 minutes.. super easy)! This was perfect for all of her baby dolls. I wasn’t able to find this in stores. I new amazon was my answer!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter has a Baby Alive and she spends hours playing with this, feeding her baby and putting her, along with others at times, in amd out. Has held up well thus far. 2 months now
customer_reviews.author: Clay Rae

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: got this for my granddaughter for Christmas. I saw it a couple days later and it wouldn’t stay together. My daughter oh no it works. So I left it at that. I was at her house yesterday and it still don’t work. Should have sent it back. Now it’s to late Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter when I saw it on Christmas morning I was very dissatisfied it’s a terribly made the feeding tray is almost impossible to get on very unstable I immediately ordered a different high chair would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: mary romeo

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this high chair-tray doesn't stay closed & doll falls out all the time. Very frustrating for my granddaughter. Wish I would have returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Provides lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters. They love it but the top won’t stay on the bottom very well
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Baby doll must have
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays with this toy daily. So way to put together and take apart but not flimsy great for any doll lover
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to see my little ones face when she this Christmas morning!!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very bad. When we received the package, the high chair was half way put together But wrong. Wrong screw on the wrong area. I was highly upset because I couldn’t get it out. Then we were missing screws. Needless to say my daughter wasn’t able to use the high chair for her baby. So much for a Christmas gift. I WILL NEVER ORDER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Garnisha Collins

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily.
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice but it's cheaply made. It keeps falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Baby girl loves it so puts her other babies in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter was delighted to receive the BABY ALIVE DOLL AND THE HIGH ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was delighted to receive the BABY ALIVE DOLL AND THE HIGH CHAIR for her birthday. Her mom and dad allowed her to keep the high chair next to her seat at the table. It was a joy to see her being a "mommy" to her hungry baby.
customer_reviews.author: candyland

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for the price. I would purchase again if need be. Easy, sturdy and fun for playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues.
customer_reviews.text: This was very cute and what my daughter wanted. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Well made High Chair
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves to feed her Baby Alive in this High Chair.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL SINCLAIR

customer_reviews.title: Product broken in two different spots.
customer_reviews.text: Product was broke in two places. Didn't want to go through the hassel of returning the item. Worried I would end up paying more to return and get a new one. Daughter was disappointed in Xmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Baby Alive Chair
customer_reviews.text: Pretty not as sturdy as we thought and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This chair is tiny small and the slide up on the one side is broken. Will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tracy P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but has no quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product but does not have a lot of quality the base of the table every hour comes out of place could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane

customer_reviews.title: Need to be returned
customer_reviews.text: The high chair collapses already on the left side. So the chair no longer sit up
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!! Sturdy Materials!!
customer_reviews.text: Good Value!! Makes a nice gift to go with “Baby Alive”
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart constantly that my daughter will no longer play with it because "it just falls down".
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We returned this item because the tray wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Runaround

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the product for the price, the quality is to cheap.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper75

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't assemble very well.
customer_reviews.text: After putting the high chair together the pieces don't match up right and I threw the box away so I couldn't send it back😞 .
customer_reviews.author: Tjawana

customer_reviews.title: Good height for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the legs don’t align up right so it’s a little off but the doll fits fine and my daughter is happy.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie placeres

customer_reviews.title: Chair is removable
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as sturdy as I would think. It’s falls off just about everytime my kids are taking their babies in and out
customer_reviews.author: ErinDenae

customer_reviews.title: Great baby high chair!
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it! She said she was happy her last high chair broke! (Last high chair was NOT a baby alive) fit wonderful with her baby alive dolls and other babies.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and kinda falls apart. Tray just pops off the high chair. The chair itself doesn’t really have a seat. Just a slant. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis.Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, especially not for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. My daughter can't even play with it because when you go to use it, the whole top comes detached from the bottom and there is no way to keep them together, they just sit on top of each other. She doesn't bother anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart very easily. Seat part doesn’t sit right. Very poorly made to be baby alive product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany  Wilson

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to assemble. This highchair is hard to assemble and it is flimsy and keeps falling over. It is super hard to read the instructions too. All-around a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul R.

customer_reviews.title: Eady to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas present, along with a Baby Alive doll. They were both well priced and were a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It’s really cute but does not stay assembled. Wate if money.
customer_reviews.author: Shereza

customer_reviews.title: Not worth getting 😐
customer_reviews.text: Not a good item. Wobbles and disassemble easily while using it. Very cheaply made. I am actually sending mine back!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Must buckle baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little highchair. The issue is it's not very strong and you have to actually buckle the baby in to get her to not slide out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Rachie Poo

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is just awful. seat pops all time. legs don't stay locked for seat. I should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn’t for the table tray, the doll would fall to the floor. The chair is more like a slide. And the chair doesn’t snap into the legs so you have to be careful how you pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice high chair for my granddaughter's baby doll. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: margaret bray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter love this high chair for her baby Alive! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lamisha

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart, dolls dont sit right in it.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together, falls apart. Dolls sit slanted and fall out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product broke
customer_reviews.text: I gave this gift to my granddaughter and 2 days after she had it it broke. I can’t return because I have no packaging. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and 1 came today. It was obvious the box was tampered with and there was no high chair seat only the legs of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well made
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the high chair. The height is just right for her to place her dolls in the high chair. Sturdy & well made.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT receive all the parts to even put the high chair together!
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Cute product!
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVED it. The legs were extremely hard to attach to the seat but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kennard

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase ever made on amazon. Cheaply made, falls apart, and is a huge disappointment. I am returning it. Just horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria VanBeekveld

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Pieces did not line up correctly and therefore could not be assembled
customer_reviews.author: Donna armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even give this a star very very small for an 8 yr old very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, had to make adjustments just to put it together
customer_reviews.author: ShyShy424

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing a part, looked like it was previously put together.
customer_reviews.author: mbacker

product_meta.title: Baby Alive Doll Deluxe High Chair Toy
product_meta.description: Baby alive doll Deluxe highchair - Feeding time! Kids are sure to love feeding their favorite dolls with this adorable high chair. Looks just like a real high chair with its adjustable seat and fun feeding tray. Let their nurturing instincts take over and watch their imaginations soar! Can be used with other baby dolls. Over 18" Tall.
feature_bullets: Seat Height adjusts up and down

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars331 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
